Key Match Events: Paredes hit a two-run single in the first inning, which proved to be the difference in a 2-1 victory for the Cubs.
Post-Match Reflections: Cubs manager Craig Counsell expressed that Paredes' win-delivering single was a big day for the player and the team.
Paredes mentioned that the mindset and execution of the plan are the main issues he is facing.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The win helped the Cubs salvage a game in the three-game set against the Yankees.
Jameson Taillon held the Yankees to one run over six innings.
Nate Pearson and Porter Hodge provided stellar relief for the Cubs.
